mapper.insert: insert into t_admin_program (program_id, parents_program_id, level, program_name, program_sort, use_yn, reg_date, update_date, location) values (#{programId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentsProgramId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update t_admin_program set program_id = #{programId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parents_program_id = #{parentsProgramId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, program_name = #{programName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, program_sort = #{programSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_yn = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_date = #{regDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where admin_program_seq = #{adminProgramSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select admin_program_seq, program_id, parents_program_id, level, program_name, program_sort, use_yn, location ,reg_date ,update_date from t_admin_program where admin_program_seq = #{adminProgramSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and use_yn<>'N'
select MAX(CAST (program_id AS integer) ) + 1 as program_id from t_admin_program where 1=1 and (program_id = #{programId} OR parents_program_id = #{programId})
